item.title: NSX for vSphere 6.0.4 - Documentation and Download?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description:
How long asÂ NSX for vSphere 6.0.4 Documentation been publicly available? I just noticed this, and that the NSX downloads seem to be available via MyVMware - If you are entitled to it that is.
Does this mean it will be available for download and we get to play with it soon-ish? It might have been available earlier too, unnoticed by yours truly…
